resources.string: I am a newbie to Android development. I am very enthusiastic about creating tech-based solutions for my community. I am determined, self motivated, curious, and have great thirst for knowledge. I am brave, I am bruised, I am who am meant to be, THIS IS ME. ~The Greatest Showman.

DroidCamp 2.0 student
 Aspiring Mobile App Developer
 Positive thinker
 I am cool/calm and learn from people.
 Love to solve world problem with technology.

My name is Oscar I am new to android development. I am passionate about learning mobile development. I hope to be a great developer one day. I am tech savvy, and easy going.When am not learning to code i am either sleeping or seeing movies at leisure

We are determined to introduce newbies and oldies interested in Android development to the framework. We hope to build a budding community of world class android developers who can take on real world projects one step at a time, we seek to mentor, train and guide budding android developers on their journey, and have fun while at it.

Hey there, I\'m Emu. An Android developer and DroidCamp student looking to hone my skills and become a professional Android Developer. I\'m excited to be here and looking to have fun on this journey Vamos!
